New Records: Arshdeep Singh achieved his career-best bowling figures of 4-9.
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh took 4 wickets for 9 runs.
India chased down the target, scoring 111-3 in 18.2 overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed relief at India qualifying for the Super Eights and praised the USA team's progress.
USA captain Aaron Jones reflected on being 10-15 runs short and praised his bowling unit.
Arshdeep Singh expressed happiness with his performance and credited the team's belief in him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium received criticism for being bowler-friendly.
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 Group A.
India secured qualification for the Super Eights.
USA's future in the tournament depends on their match against Ireland.
